query:
SELECT 
  'Kreditoren' as typ, 
  COUNT(*) as anzahl, 
  u.name as firma
FROM kreditoren k
JOIN unternehmen u ON k.unternehmen_id = u.id
GROUP BY u.name
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Debitoren' as typ, 
  COUNT(*) as anzahl, 
  u.name as firma
FROM debitoren d
JOIN unternehmen u ON d.unternehmen_id = u.id
GROUP BY u.name;
